entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 1:41 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 70 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
